Articles.Content: Is this mod still available? I had it, and it worked for .90...it seemed to still work with 1.0 but seems to have broken somewhere between 1.0 and 1.04. Is an update available, or is there another alternative? I'm doing EVAs on Minmus with my jet pack, and it would be handy to be able to see where I need to go without burning excess monopropellant. Thanks! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Ah! The previous version I had was on Curse, and it's vanished from there; figures! Thanks very much ! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
